1.text: Wash the ink off with soap and water.

2.text: Rub vegetable shortening or butter on the ink.

3.text: Squirt non-gel toothpaste onto the ink and rub it into the skin.
3.vid: /1/1d/Get Pen off Your Skin Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

4.text: Rub a cooled, used teabag over the pen ink.

5.text: Squirt hand sanitizer onto the ink and rub in small, circular motions.

6.text: Wet a cotton ball or washcloth with isopropyl alcohol (rubbing alcohol or surgical spirit) and scrub the ink off your skin.

7.text: Spray the pen marks with hairspray and wipe them off with a clean towel.
7.vid: /f/f6/Get Pen off Your Skin Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Use a cotton-ball soaked with acetone nail polish remover to rub off the ink.
8.vid: /b/bc/Get Pen off Your Skin Step 3 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Spray or wet the area with white vinegar, then use a paper towel to rub away the ink.
